sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO md_migr_parameter ( id , connection_id_fk , object_id , object_type , param_existing , param_order , param_name , param_type , param_data_type , percision , scale , nullable , default_value , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by ) VALUES ( #id# , #connectionIdFk# , #objectId# , #objectType# , #paramExisting# , #paramOrder# , #paramName# , #paramType# , #paramDataType# , #percision# , #scale# , #nullable# , #defaultValue# , #securityGroupId# , #createdOn# , #createdBy# , #lastUpdatedOn# , #lastUpdatedBy# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE md_migr_parameter SET id = #id# , connection_id_fk = #connectionIdFk# , object_id = #objectId# , object_type = #objectType# , param_existing = #paramExisting# , param_order = #paramOrder# , param_name = #paramName# , param_type = #paramType# , param_data_type = #paramDataType# , percision = #percision# , scale = #scale# , nullable = #nullable# , default_value = #defaultValue# , security_group_id = #securityGroupId# , created_on = #createdOn# , created_by = #createdBy# , last_updated_on = #lastUpdatedOn# , last_updated_by = #lastUpdatedBy# WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM md_migr_parameter WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT id , connection_id_fk , object_id , object_type , param_existing , param_order , param_name , param_type , param_data_type , percision , scale , nullable , default_value , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by FROM MD_MIGR_PARAMETER WHERE id = #id#

SELECT A.ID , A.CONNECTION_ID_FK , A.OBJECT_ID , A.OBJECT_TYPE , A.PARAM_EXISTING , A.PARAM_ORDER , A.PARAM_NAME , A.PARAM_TYPE , A.PARAM_DATA_TYPE , A.PERCISION , A.SCALE , A.NULLABLE , A.DEFAULT_VALUE , A.SECURITY_GROUP_ID , A.CREATED_ON , A.CREATED_BY , A.LAST_UPDATED_ON , A.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM ( SELECT ID , CONNECTION_ID_FK , OBJECT_ID , OBJECT_TYPE , PARAM_EXISTING , PARAM_ORDER , PARAM_NAME , PARAM_TYPE , PARAM_DATA_TYPE , PERCISION , SCALE , NULLABLE , DEFAULT_VALUE , SECURITY_GROUP_ID , CREATED_ON , CREATED_BY , LAST_UPDATED_ON , LAST_UPDATED_BY , ROWNUM FROM MD_MIGR_PARAMETER WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
CONNECTION_ID_FK LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM MD_MIGR_PARAMETER WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
CONNECTION_ID_FK LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
